name: PassiveTotal
description: This app implements investigative actions by integrating with the PassiveTotal cloud reputation service

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity

actions.verbose: Passive information about a domain could get very large, because of which the calls could timeout. Use the from and to parameters to limit the passive data to query between a time range. If from parameter is not specified, the action gets data for the past 30 days.

from.description: The start date for Passive data (YYYY-MM-DD)

to.description: The end date for Passive data (YYYY-MM-DD)

example_values: Total unique domains: 4, Dynamic domain: False, Classification: None, Sinkhole: None, First seen: 2018-08-08 15:47:02, Ever compromised: False, Last seen: 2018-09-01 02:49:36

actions.verbose: Passive information about an IP could get very large, resulting in timeouts. Use the from and to parameters to limit the passive data to query between a time range. If from parameter is not specified, the action gets data for the past 30 days.

from.description: The start date for Passive data (YYYY-MM-DD)

to.description: The end date for Passive data (YYYY-MM-DD)
